markdownRemark.html:
I’m Dani.

People know me as a mobile app developer and “The React guy” cuz I speak about javascript and javascript frameworks like React a lot in tech events and communities in Chennai. I love programming and building cool apps and that’s what I do for a living. I code by the day and sleep by the night while studying particle physics on the coffee breaks.

I’m currently working in Pickyourtrail as their chief meme creator and also coding the intelligent travel assistant PYT Mobile app.

The love for software engineering is a result my love for problem solving which is still keeping me explore different fields of science and engineering. You can checkout my blog Science and StarDust where I write about the interesting things I learnt.
